Package ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.modules.errorControl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseErrorControllerModule
    This abstract class implements the basic methods needed for typical stepsize controllers to estimate the next stepsize based on an error estimate.
    EmbErrControllerModule
    This class implements a stepsize controller that finds an optimal stepsize based on an embedded error estimate.
    EmbErrEstimatorModule
    Module to estimate the error based on a embedded error-estimation methods.
    EmbErrExplicitPIControllerModule
    This class implements a stepsize controller that finds an optimal stepsize based on an embedded error estimate.
    EmbErrImplicitPredictiveControllerModule
    This class implements a stepsize controller that finds an optimal stepsize based on an embedded error estimate.
    InitialStepSizeSelectorModule
    This class calculates an initial stepsize for variable stepsize methods for the particular problem
    SdErrControllerModule
    This class implements a stepsize controller that uses an optimal stepsize based on an step-doubling error estimate.
    SdErrEstimatorModule
    Module to estimate the error based on a step-doubling error-estimation method.
